---
category: news
title: "Automakers deploy Cerence AI, Apple unlocking expansion rumored"
excerpt: "In the latest round of automotive AI and biometric advances, Apple may be rolling out its (optionally biometric) CarKey feature, while EV makers NIO and VinFast are integrating more tech by Cerence. Apple’s CarKey allows iPhone and Apple Watch users to register a virtual car key on their Apple device which unlocks a car door and then allows the engine to be started via NFC."
